# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your business. Given its exceptional value and quality, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $13,500. This is a unique opportunity to acquire an asset worth $12,000 to you at a competitive rate, ensuring you maximize your investment while gaining a valuable resource. I look forward to hearing your response and the possibility of partnering with you on this exciting venture. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $13,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $13,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $12,000
